message: Let's start fair. I'm offering you 40$, and I'll take 60$.  This way we both get a good share.
Your turn Alice. I'm proposing a slightly better split this time, 55$ for me and 45$ for you.  The money will be worth less if we wait any longer!
Let's split it evenly this time. I think 50/50 is a fair compromise.  The money keeps losing value, so let's not wait any longer.
